message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.PL, cs.LO. 

The paper focuses on the development of a SysML-based Model-Driven Engineering environment for the design and verification of secure embedded systems. This involves the integration of security requirements and threats into the hardware/software partitioning of the system architecture, as well as the formal verification of security mechanisms. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), followed by cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses the use of model transformation techniques and formal verification, which could place it in the cs.PL (Programming Languages) or cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) sub-categories.
